this_title: Zivot a neobycejna dobrodruzstvi vojaka Ivana Conkina
introduction: Genre : ComedyYear : 1994Length : 1:44:07Director : Jiri MenzelStarring : Alexander Nazarov, Zoya Buryak, Vladimir Ilyin, Valery Zolotukhin, Aleksei Zharkov, Yuri Dubrovin, Sergey Garmash, Zino Gerdt, Marian Labuda, Maria VinogradovaDescription : A screen adaptation of the satirical book by Vladimir Voinovich, a well-known in our country. Painting successfully passed the style of the book - is absurd and grotesque proportions brought to hysterically funny, but with all this lyricism is present. This can only compare with the adventures of the Good Soldier Schweik. first film version of the famous satirical novel by Vladimir Voinovich filmed in the Czech Republic, Jiri Menzel famous director unusually delicate and lyrically. Currently flying through the sky eroplan. Flying, flying, and then took and sverzilsya our native Soviet soil. But not homicidal sverzilsya, and so, in a series of crash landing. The pilot, survived a brief shock from contact with curious farmers, went to his squadron and the aircraft remained stuck in the middle of the field, as a triumph of the human mind over the human mind.
foreign_title: Zivot a neobycejna dobrodruzstvi vojaka Ivana Conkina
